# Handige links voor R {.unnumbered}

Deze handleiding is gericht op de uitleg van Quarto en zal daarom geen uitgebreide uitleg van R bevatten. Wel staan hieronder links naar informatie op het internet die mogelijk kan helpen bij het vullen van de R codeblokken in Markdown.

## Algemeen

* [Cheatsheets](https://posit.co/resources/cheatsheets/)
* [R Cookbook](https://rc2e.com/)
* [R for Data Science](https://r4ds.had.co.nz/)
* [Advanced R](https://adv-r.hadley.nz/)
* [Efficient R](https://csgillespie.github.io/efficientR/)
* [R Markdown](https://bookdown.org/yihui/rmarkdown/)
* [R en databases](https://db.rstudio.com/)

## Analyses

* [Exploring Complex Survey Data Analysis Using R](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/get-started)
* [Tekst mining met R](https://www.tidytextmining.com/)
* [Geospatial Statistics in R](https://geocompr.robinlovelace.net/)
* [R en statistiek](https://moderndive.com)
* [Population Health Data Science with R](https://bookdown.org/taragonmd/phds/)

## Visualisatie
* [Interactive web-based data visualization with R, plotly and shiny](https://plotly-r.com/)
* [R Graphics Cookbook](https://r-graphics.org/)
* [Modern Data Visualisation with R](https://rkabacoff.github.io/datavis/)
* [gt Cookbook](https://themockup.blog/static/resources/gt-cookbook-advanced)
